dbxml

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JerseyClient

    public interface Client

      throws Exception

      • queryJSON

        String queryJSON(String json)
          throws Exception
        Translate a JSON specification to an XQuery and run the query.
        Parameters:
        json - - See Tethys RESTFUL Web Services Interface for format.
        Returns:
        query result
        Throws:
        Exception

      • queryJSON

        String queryJSON(String json,
                 int plan)
          throws Exception
        Translate a JSON specification to an XQuery
        Parameters:
        json - - JSON specification, see Tethys RESTful Interface manual for details.
        plan - - 0 - execute query 1 - show query plan 2 - show XQuery
        Returns:
        - query result, plan, or XQuery
        Throws:
        Exception - Server errros due to bad queries, etc.

      • removeDocument

        String removeDocument(String Collection,
                      String DocId)
               throws Exception
        Remove a document from a collection
        Parameters:
        Collection - - Collection from which to delete
        DocId - - document id. This is the last part of the uri e.g. uri: dbxml:///Detections/SOCAL32M_mysticete delete_docId("Detections", "SOCAL32M_mysticete")
        Returns:
        operation status as XML string
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getSchema

        String getSchema(String schema_root)
        Retrieve representation of a schema
        Parameters:
        schema_root - - Root element of the schema
        Returns:
        CSV string
